## Lola Ugarte

Professor of Statistics, Public University of Navarre, Spain

::: columns
::: {.column width="80%"}

Lola Ugarte is a Spanish statistician and professor at the Public University of Navarre. She is an expert in spatial statistics, spatio-temporal analysis, and small area estimation. She is a co-author of the textbook Probability and Statistics with R and has held prominent positions, including vice president of the Spanish Statistical Society and treasurer of the Federation of European National Statistical Societies. For more information, visit her [home page](https://www.unavarra.es/personal/lugarte/indexfotoingles.htm).

:::

Postdoctoral Research fellow in High Performance Computing, CEMSE Division, KAUST

::: columns
::: {.column width="80%"}
